features.featureTitle: Update the site profile/logo image to reflect the newly uploaded file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" by regenerating the existing generated profile image asset used on the landing page hero (keep the same referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png").

Update the site favicon to reflect the newly uploaded file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" by regenerating the existing generated favicon asset referenced in frontend/index.html (keep the same referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png").

Ensure the updated profile/logo image derived from "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 12.06.36-1.jpeg" does not contain any user-facing text that contradicts the current site content, specifically it must not show "Cardiology" as an available service/department.
